channel.title: Oakley with Wootton on Our Oakley
channel.description: Recent content in Oakley with Wootton on Our Oakley

item.title: Kintsugi Hope wellbeing course (evening)
item.description:
Evening version of the 10-week Kintsugi Hope wellbeing course.

This is the beginning of a supportive 10-week journey designed to help participants develop resilience and wellbeing skills. The course provides practical tools and strategies for managing life’s challenges in a safe, welcoming environment.

Evening sessions available for those who cannot attend the daytime course.

item.title: Kintsugi Hope wellbeing course (daytime)
item.description:
Start of a 10-week Kintsugi Hope course helping people handle stress, worries, relationships and the pressures of modern life.

This is the beginning of a supportive 10-week journey designed to help participants develop resilience and wellbeing skills. The course provides practical tools and strategies for managing life’s challenges in a safe, welcoming environment.

item.title: Blue Christmas
item.description:
A reflective service of comfort & hope

Blue Christmas is a reflective service of comfort & hope for anyone facing a difficult Christmas.

Please join us for a quiet candlelit service of reflection, prayer, silence & music.

Everyone is welcome.

Contact: office@oww.church | T: 01256 782724

An online service will be available on the St Leonard’s Oakley YouTube channel.

Find the link at www.stleonards-church.co.uk

item.title: Advent Gallery
item.description:
Community Gallery Event

St Leonard’s is thrilled to host a community gallery event exploring Advent themes of light | hope | presence.

We warmly invite contributions from local artists of any age or ability to our first ever St Leonard’s Advent Gallery event.

When: From 7pm on Thursday 18th Dec at the St Leonard’s Centre

Any medium is welcome – paintings, photography, sculpture, textiles, music, poetry, and more.

All contributions must be submitted by Sunday 14th Dec.

item.title: Candlelit Carol Service
item.description:
Traditional Candlelit Carol Service

Join us for a beautiful candlelit carol service at St Leonard’s Church, Oakley.

The service will be followed by mulled wine and mince pies.

Date: Sunday 14 December 2025
Time: 7:00pm
Venue: St Leonard’s Church, Oakley

Everyone is welcome to this special Christmas celebration.

item.title: Christingle
item.description:
Christingle Services

Let the Light Shine!

Start the season with a festive service celebrating the true meaning of Christmas!

Service Times

3:00-3:30pm - A Mini-Christingle for the little ones

4:30-5:30pm - The BIG Christingle for everyone

Date: Sunday 7th December 2025
Venue: St Leonard’s, Oakley
Address: Rectory Road | RG23 7ED

Join us for these special Christingle services as we celebrate the light of Christ coming into the world.

item.title: The Bereavement Journey
item.description:
The Bereavement Journey – a place to talk

Grief is hard.

Death can impact all of life.

7 Sessions of films and discussion for anyone bereaved anytime

Topics include: • Attachment, separation and loss • The pain and responses of grief • Anger and guilt • Coping with others’ reactions • Delayed and suppressed grief • Adjusting to change • Moving forward healthily • Faith questions – a Christian perspective (optional)

item.title: Holiday@Home
item.description:
An event for Senior Residents of Oakley and Wooton St Lawrence.

Celebrating Jane Austen

Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday 10:00 - 4:00 PM each day

Enjoy activities, entertainment, quizzes, cooked lunch, tea & cake.

To book or for more information contact St Leonards Centre Office 01256 782724 or office@oww.church
